file_content.text: ...after the test results came in, we made some modifications. The serum lasts longer, and the side effects kick in later.
But it's still lethal. No matter what we do, Cyclone will burn up its users from the inside out.
I'm not concerned about fatalities. The men and women taking the serum understand the necessity of sacrifice.
This is an important day for us. You've created a new weapon in our fight for freedom--one that we'll use to great advantage.
We're all honored to hear that from the Eagle, sir. VerveGen is your partner in the cause.
The Eagle himself. This has been a long time coming.
Hello.
Apparently. But I don't think I know you.
VerveGen's finished. Find a new supplier.
Not anymore. [Attack]
[Remain silent]
How do you want to proceed?
You and your men will distribute Cyclone to the cells and continue overseeing Nar Shaddaa.
VerveGen will remain under your watch. Raythen Predot will continue managing the business.
I appreciate your faith in me, sir.
Smugglers are ready and waiting. As soon as we're done here, I'll get the serum to them.
Your cell wasn't easy to find. Almost lost your trail.
You're the terrorist leader?
What the deuce--?
Some sort of holographic disguise. The droid's no droid.
I don't understand...
I'm afraid I can't give you that chance.
No, you won't. [Attack]
Deal with this interruption now. All of you.
[Remain silent]
Excellent. If we need VerveGen again, I'll contact you. Otherwise, use your initiative.
End transmission.
You heard him. Grab the serum and go. Raythen--
I'm sorry, sir--I was doing a full sensor scan, and that droid over there is showing unusual readings.
I don't recognize it. It certainly shouldn't be in the conference room.
Don't tell me this meeting is "terrorists only"?
Am I in the wrong place?
I'm merely going about my assigned task, master.
I'm an ordinary droid!
That's no droid. I can disrupt the hologram....
Looks like we've got a visitor. Let's handle this.
Correct. [Attack]
We're all honored to hear that from the Eagle--
Quiet, Raythen. We've got a visitor.
Who are you? Why are you interrupting a private meeting?
Thought I could learn a few things. Make a few contacts.
It seemed like a good idea.
Everyone, weapons down--before this turns ugly.
Surrender!
Handle this. You all know your duties.
You can answer questions once you're strapped down in a medlab.
Chorto, we can't start shooting up VerveGen--what do I tell the employees?
Anyone from VerveGen can leave. The Eagle's people stay.
I'm not after innocents.
I--thank you. None of this was our idea anyway.
Pathetic. Now that they're out of the way, we'll deal with this.
Let's not fight.
Oh, I can think of a few.
That's the last of your problems right now.
I don't care.
What do you think? [Attack]
Enough of this.
Let's deal with this intruder.
Something's wrong with the internal defenses. I can't get a response!
This is wrong. Everything's going wrong. Use the Cyclone if you have to!
Secure the building, and don't let anyone escape. Anyone who needs a boost from Cyclone--take it!
